query:
SELECT id, name, city, address, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stalls WHERE market_id = markets.id) as stalls_count
FROM markets
ORDER BY stalls_count DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3JHjEVidcAySpCH.root --database hkVUJNrozhntVqLGt4TSzx --execute SELECT id, name, city, address, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stalls WHERE market_id = markets.id) as stalls_count
FROM markets
ORDER BY stalls_count DESC;
